div.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow happening fsItemCount_20 fsSlideshowHorizontal
fsElement fsPostElement fsList featured-news fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_3

strong.em: Educating Students to Succeed in a Changing World

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: I hope you are all doing well! Today, Governor Pritzker suspended all in-person instruction for all schools through the end of the school year. With this new directive, we will continue our remote learning through the end of the year. Our teachers continue to develop lessons, activities, and videos on a daily basis. In addition, they absolutely love the Google Hangouts Meetings with the students each week. I also want to continue to express my gratitude to you and our staff for all of your efforts as we continue to adjust to this new learning environment.

With the school buildings now closed through the end of the year, we are developing a plan for your students to come to the school to pick up their belongings. We are also reviewing grade level transitioning events as well as a virtual Wood Oaks Graduation. More information will follow on these and other items.

I also wanted to provide you with additional reading resources that the Northbrook Library has graciously created to support the schools. Just click on thislink.I trust these resources will be of help to you.

As a member of the Glenview/Northbrook Coronavirus Task Force, I continue to be so impressed by all the wonderful acts of collaboration, generosity, and goodness demonstrated in our community. This weeks Task Force Message will be in a separate news post.

Thank you all, again, for your continued support and for your grace and flexibility at this time. Please continue to take care of yourselves and your families, and let us know if we can be of service to you.

article.h2: Managing the Flood of Emotions Brought on by a Pandemic Part 2

p.span: Register here to receive a Zoom link for Part 2.

img.alt: Flyer for and event on Managing the Flood of Emotions Brought on by a Pandemic
